price: Ubwo umuvandimwe wabo Lutwi yababwiraga ati “Ese ntimwatinya (Allah)?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
